title: book_Historical_Romances
text:
ISBN-13: 9780940450820.
ISBN-10: 0940450828.
Title: Historical Romances.
Subtitle: The Prince and the Pauper, A Connecticut Yankee in King Arthur's Court, Personal Recollections of Joan of Arc.
Authors: Mark Twain;Samuel Langhorne Clemens;Victor and Lin Salamo editors Fischer;Susan K. Harris;Susan R. Harris.
Categories: Fiction.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=yH13sFcsjYUC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&edge=curl&source=gbs_api.
Description: An anthology encompassing The Prince and the Pauper, A Connecticut Yankee, and Joan of Arc features Twain's imaginative studies of the Middle Ages, in a children's classic, a unique comic-violent fantasy, and a respectful fictional biography..
Published Year: 1994.
Average Rating: 4.37.
Number of Pages: 1050.
Ratings Count: 280.
